    • Constructor Detail

      • AI

        public AI(java.lang.Integer cells,
          java.lang.String color,
          int fromX,
          int fromY,
          int toX,
          int toY,
          Game game)
        Constructor creates player and generates the player's cells
        Parameters:
        cells - Number of cells of player
        color - String in lowercase of player color. Either "blue" or "red"
        fromX - Used to generate cells in random from this X
        fromY - Used to generate cells in random from this Y
        toX - Used to generate cells in random to this X
        toY - Used to generate cells in random to this Y
        game - Reference to the game being played
